name: Trash Mage
description:
TrashMage is a top-down shooter game where you fight against huge apps to clean up storage space in a mobile world.

Collect the data from enemies and send it to the void through your toilet! Kill them to open up storage space before it is too late.

This game is made for Ludum Dare 42: Running Out of Space.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Pew pew
